abstract: Rating the performance of U.S. players in an international friendly against Ecuador.
snippet: Rating the performance of U.S. players in an international friendly against Ecuador.
lead_paragraph: HARRISON, N.J. -- While its defense looked sturdy against a quality team, the United States did not build on Saturday's promising offensive display against Honduras. In fact, you could argue that Tuesday night's game against Ecuador represented a step in the wrong direction -- a step away from the opponent's goal.
